name: Supertactix Basketball
description:
Compete for the Supertactix Championship in this tactical turn-based basketball sim.

Select your starting lineup and training focus, then play the games turn by turn on both offence and defence.

Compete using one of the 16 teams and submit your final season score to the global leaderboards to compare with the worlds best Supertactix players.

Compatible with iPhone/iPhone X and iPad.
